statements: DELETE FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
DELETE FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE vehicle_id = 101 AND maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
DELETE FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE next_maintenance_date < '2023-01-01' OR last_maintenance_date IS NULL;
DELETE FROM mechanic WHERE mechanic_specialization = 'Engine Repair';
DELETE FROM Vehicle WHERE model = 'Accord' AND year < 2010;
DELETE FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE vehicle_id = 1 AND maintenance_type = 'Oil Change'
DELETE FROM mechanic WHERE name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM vehicle WHERE model = 'Civic' AND make = 'Honda';
